# isRunning

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller’s workflow is currently running.

## Declaration

```swift
var isRunning: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the controller’s workflow is currently running; [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. Use `isRunning:` to determine whether the receiver’s workflow is currently running.

## Getting Workflow Information

- **canRun**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller’s workflow is able to run.
- **isPaused**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller’s workflow is currently paused.
